src:
Lionel Messi Raih Nilai 10/10 yang ke-100 dari Whoscored
01 Nov 2019, 10:14 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Lionel Messi tak berhenti membuat catatan impresif. Usai melawan Real Valladolid, Rabu (30/10/2019) kemarin WIB, bintang Barcelona tersebut mencatatkan nilai sempurna ke-100 dari Whoscored.
Lionel Messi menjadi pemain La Liga pertama yang mendapat nilai 10/10 pada musim ini. Ia mendapat nilai tersebut saat Barcelona menghancurkan Sevilla dan Real Valladolid.
Saat melawan Real Valladolid, Lionel Messi mencetak dua gol serta dua assist. La Pulga juga membuat Oscar Plano seperti kehilangan semangat hidup. La Pulga membuat si kulit bundar melesat melewati kedua kaki Plano.
Messi pun semakin identik dengan angka 10. Apalagi di Blaugrana Messi mengenakan nomor punggung 10.



Lionel Messi pertama kali mendapatkan nilai tersebut saat Barcelona bertemu dengan Arsenal di Liga Champions 2010. Ia memborong empat gol Barcelona dan mengalahkan pemain asuhan Arsene Wenger seperti bermain PlayStation.
text:
Lionel Messi Wins 100th 10/10 on Whoscored
Nov 1, 2019, 10:14 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Lionel Messi does not stop making impressive notes. After against Real Valladolid, Wednesday (10/30/2019) yesterday WIB, the Barcelona star recorded a 100th perfect score from Whoscored.
Lionel Messi became the first La Liga player to get a 10/10 this season. He got that value when Barcelona destroyed Sevilla and Real Valladolid.
When against Real Valladolid, Lionel Messi scored two goals and two assists. La Pulga also made Oscar Plano lose his zest for life. La Pulga made the round leather go past Plano's two legs.
Messi was increasingly synonymous with the number 10. Especially in Blaugrana Messi wearing the back number 10.



Lionel Messi first gained that value when Barcelona met Arsenal in the 2010 Champions League. He bought up four Barcelona goals and beat Arsene Wenger's players like playing PlayStation.
